entry.title: Freckled Sage DIY Christmas Placemats or Runner Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oilcloth By The Yard
Type: Kits
Price: 12.95

This kit designed by Freckled Sage,  provides enough fabric and instructions to make 2 finished double sided placemats or one double-sided runner!

Perfect for hostess gift or your holiday table! Easy sewing instructions, perfect DIY kit for Teens!

Requires minimal sewing skills!

Choose from:

Christmas Stars on Red with Dot Gold

Christmas Stars on Green with Red Gingham

Christmas Stars on Green with Red Dot

Christmas Stars on Blue with Gold Gingham

$12.00 per kit

While Supplies Last
